Text: Name Correction The following name correction was completed in GCP today CP ID FROM TO Malik Auto Center George Bell Trucking Ltd dba Malik Auto Center Shortname changes will be coordinated with ERMS IT on Friday November Thanks Ruby Kyser Global Data Management Fax

Name Correction The following name correction was completed in GCP today CP ID FROM TO Malik Auto Center George Bell Trucking Ltd dba Malik Auto Center Shortname changes will be coordinated with ERMS IT on Friday November Thanks Ruby Kyser Global Data Management Fax

FW ClickPaper Approvals GCP Responsecalled the counterparty this morning at the California location and spoke to Stephanie Ludwick she confirmed that Pacific Forest Resources does indeed have Inc at the end of the name I also asked if the same was true for the Connecticut location since that is the location reflected in GCP and she again said yes that there is an Inc at the end of the name for that location too If you have any further questions please feel free to give me a call at ext Ruby Kyser Original Message From Johnson Cheryl Sent Friday May PM To Kyser Ruby Cc Coleman Tandra Rodriguez Bernice Subject FW ClickPaper Approvals GCP Response Ruby can you please follow through on this request from Tana I left you a note along with the Articles and LexNex info If there has been no name change to include Inc please let Bernice know so the name can be updated in GCP Thanks Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday May PM To Johnson Cheryl Subject RE ClickPaper Approvals GCP Response Its on its way Cheryl nronXgate PM To Tana CT cc Bernice nronXgate Tandra nronXgate Subject RE ClickPaper Approvals GCP Response Hi Tana We did have it set up in the system without Inc but I got a request from the settlements group to add Inc to the name I personally verified it with the counterparty and changed the record in GCP LexisNexis shows that it was incorporated in California in as Pacific Forest Resources Inc Yes please fax the articles to so I can get this clarified once and for all Thanks Cheryl x Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday May AM To Johnson Cheryl Cc Schott Samuel Subject RE ClickPaper Approvals GCP Response Re Pacific Forest Resources Unless this is another company or they have changed their name subsequent to the execution of the ISDA Master in we have an ISDA Master in place with this counterparty and have a copy of their Articles of Incorporation in the file and there is no Inc at the end of this companys name If you would like me to send you a company of the companys Articles of Incorporation I will be happy to do so Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on AM Samuel nronXgate PM To Aparna nronXgate Kelly nronXgate Steve nronXgate Tanya nronXgate Tom nronXgate Tana CT Frank L nronXgate Ken nronXgate Nicole nronXgate Lesli nronXgate Angela Y nronXgate Amber nronXgate Karen nronXgate Fraisy nronXgate Tandra nronXgate Wendi nronXgate Thu Pham nronXgate cc Subject RE ClickPaper Approvals GCP Response Any GCP adjustments will be highlighted in blue File CP xls Rgds Samuel x Enron Net Works Global Counterparty Team

Belco Oil Gas Corp Merger w Westport Resources Corp Cc Good afternoon I work with Cheryl Johnson in Global Counterparty doing name changes acquisitions and mergers and have run into a minor setback with one of the counterparties I received a lead from one of my coworkers that a merger and concurrent name change had occurred involving the above referenced entities To follow up on the lead I spoke to Howard Boigon at he is the lawyer handling the transaction and I requested documentation in the form of copies of Secretary of State documents relevant to the changes Mr Boigon informed me that he had forwarded a DPL Notice to you with a complete package detailing the transaction He refuses to send anything further until I get with you and find out if what he sent is sufficient if it is not he has requested that someone from legal call him and explain what we need and why Could you please follow up with me on this issuedont you just love Mondays Ruby Kyser Ext

FW Belco Oil Gas Corp Merger w Westport Resources CorpThought I would check back with you to see if you have had time to address the issue below I had forwarded you on the th of this month I am trying to tie up loose ends on as many open name change issues as I can before I go on vacation Currently I am in need of copies of the Secretary of State certificates for the merger and the concurrent name change Belco Oil Gas Corp has quite a bit of exposure and is on Credit Watch with this in mind I would like to clean this merger up in the database as soon as possible As I mentioned below Mr Boigon will only speak to someone from our Legal Department since he feels he has sent ample documentation already Please feel free to forward me a name and number if you would prefer I redirect this inquiry Sincerely Ruby Kyser Ext Original Message From Kyser Ruby Sent Monday October PM To Jones Tana Cc Johnson Cheryl Subject Belco Oil Gas Corp Merger w Westport Resources Corp Good afternoon I work with Cheryl Johnson in Global Counterparty doing name changes acquisitions and mergers and have run into a minor setback with one of the counterparties I received a lead from one of my coworkers that a merger and concurrent name change had occurred involving the above referenced entities To follow up on the lead I spoke to Howard Boigon at and I requested documentation in the form of copies of Secretary of State documents relevant to the changes Mr Boigon informed me that he had forwarded a DPL Notice to you with a complete package detailing the transaction He refuses to send anything further until I get with you and find out if what he sent is sufficient if it is not he has requested that someone from legal call him and explain what we need and why Could you please follow up with me on this issuedont you just love Mondays Ruby Kyser Ext

WE or Mary Brewer TrustGood morning I just returned from a week and a half vacation and wanted to check the status of the request I had left with you on the th In regards to the sale of one of the Brewer wells I had faxed you a copy of documentation filed with Enron back in for you to review and confirm that the documentation was sufficient to make the necessary change from WE or Mary Brewer Trust to Brewer Natural Gas LLC Mr Brewer is awaiting notification from me that this issue is either resolved or more documentation is needed Please let me know if you have had a chance to look this documentation over or if I need to refax the information for your review Sincerely Ruby Kyser Global Data Management Fax
